imdb.plot outline: SuperModel / VJ turned actor Wiqar Ali Khan is all set to make his television debut as the lead actor with veteran Jamal Shah, director 28 episode of TV serial Aag (2014) on Aaj channel Play Max TV. The play is a modern day story of a feudal lord (Jamal Shah) and his most trusted bodyguard (Wiqar Ali Khan). Each holds onto what they imagine to be correct and the trials and tribulations unfold. The play is mostly shot in Punjab and its cast include Asaldin Khan, Shafqat Cheema, Ghulam Mohidin, Shamil Khan, Ushna Shah and many more. Wiqar Ali Khan is also working in Yasir Jaswal's much awaited film Jalibee (2015) as the lead actor. He is also the 1st male host of the 12 episode realist TV show Veet Miss Supermodel 2014.
imdb.title: Aag
plot: SuperModel / VJ turned actor Wiqar Ali Khan is all set to make his television debut as the lead actor with veteran Jamal Shah, director 28 episode of TV serial _Aag_ (qv) (2014) on Aaj channel Play Max TV. The play is a modern day story of a feudal lord (Jamal Shah) and his most trusted bodyguard (Wiqar Ali Khan). Each holds onto what they imagine to be correct and the trials and tribulations unfold. The play is mostly shot in Punjab and its cast include Asaldin Khan, Shafqat Cheema, Ghulam Mohidin, Shamil Khan, Ushna Shah and many more. Wiqar Ali Khan is also working in Yasir Jaswal's much awaited film Jalibee (2015) as the lead actor. He is also the 1st male host of the 12 episode realist TV show Veet Miss Supermodel 2014.::world news view
